src:
Dobro poznati Španac sudi duel Zvezde i Totenhema
04 Nov 2019, 11:53 by Darko
Španski arbitar Karlos del Sero Grande određen je za glavnog sudiju utakmice 4. kola Lige šampiona između Crvene zvezde i Totenhema.
Španac već šest godina sudi na međunarodnoj sceni, a dobro je poznat i crveno-belima. Del Sero Grande je bio glavni sudija utakmice 3. kola kvalifikacija za Ligu šampiona između Crvene zvezde i Spartaka iz Trnave, odigrane prošle godine u Beogradu. Taj meč je završen rezultatom 1:1, a gol za Zvezdu postigao je Ben iz jedanaesterca koji je dosudio Španac posle prekršaja nad Krstičićem.
Godinu dana ranije Karlos del Sero Grande je sudio utakmicu Lige Evrope između Partizana i albanskog Skenderbega, koju su crno-beli dobili sa 2:0.
Za pomoćne arbitre na meču između Zvezde i Totenhema određeni su Huan Karlos Juste i Roberto Alonso, dok je četvrti sudija Hose Luis Montero.
Utakmica 4. kola Lige šampiona Crvena zvezda – Totenhem igra se u sredu od 21 sat.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
The well-known Spaniard judges the duel of Star and Tottenham
04 Nov 2019, 12:53 by Darko
Spanish arbitrator Carlos del Sero Grande has been named the referee of the Champions League match between Red Star and Tottenham.
The Spaniard has been on the international scene for six years and is well known to the red and white people. Del Sero Grande was the main referee of the 3rd round of Champions League qualifying between Red Star and Spartak Trnava, played last year in Belgrade. The match ended with a score of 1: 1, and the goal for Zvezda was scored by Ben from the penalty spot, which was awarded by the Spaniard after a foul against Krsticic.
A year earlier, Carlos del Sero Grande had judged a Europa League match between Partizan and Albanian Skenderbeg, which the Black and Whites won 2-0.
Juan Carlos Carlos Juste and Roberto Alonso were appointed arbitrary arbitrators in the match between Star and Tottenham, while fourth judge Jose Luis Montero.
Matchday 4 of the Champions League Red Star - Tottenham play at 9pm on Wednesday.
